TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDependentKeyValueFactory`1<TKey>

Docs.typeparam: The generic type of the key.

summary.para: A factory for key values based on the foreign key values taken from various forms of entity data.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.
